src:
Slipknot Konfirmasi Datang ke Hammersonic 2020
06 Nov 2019, 19:26 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Band metal Slipknot mengonfirmasi kehadirannya dalam festival musik Hammersonic yang diadakan pada 2020 mendatang. (Wikimedia Commons/Chimot Maggot Iowa)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Band heavy metal Slipknot mengonfirmasi kehadirannya dalam festival musik Hammersonic yang diadakan pada 2020 mendatang.Melalui unggahan di media sosial, pelantun Surfacing tersebut mengumumkan kedatangan mereka ke Asia Tenggara pada 2020 mendatang."Kami akan datang ke Asia untuk Knot Fest Japan, Hammersonic dan masih banyak lagi di Maret 2020," kata Slipknot dalam unggahannya, Rabu (6/11).



Kedatangan Slipknot juga dikonfirmasi oleh pihak Hammersonic. Festival musik itu akan kembali hadir setelah terakhir kali diselenggarakan pada 22 Juli 2018 di Ancol, Jakarta Utara."Harinya akhirnya tiba. Kami senang mengumumkan bahwa Slipknot resmi menjadi salah satu pengisi utama Hammersonic 2020," kata pihak Hammersonic dalam unggahannya."Stay tune terus untuk kejutan berikutnya," lanjut pernyataan tersebut.



Selain untuk Hammersonic, diberitakan The Straits Times, Slipknot juga dijadwalkan untuk tampil di Singapore Rock Festival II pada 24 Maret 2020.Festival musik Hammersonic pada September lalu mengumumkan akan kembali menghentak para penggemar musik metal lewat gelaran terbaru.Hal itu diumumkan oleh penyelenggara melalui video singkat di akun Instagram mereka, Jumat (6/9). Video itu menampilkan tulisan Hammersonic dan slogan "The Rise of Empire"."Monster is Back!! Be prepared Hammerhead!" kata pernyataan dalam video tersebut. Dalam video itu pula terdapat tulisan angka Romawi "MMXX" yang bermakna "2020" dan menyiratkan penyelenggaraan keempat festival itu akan berlangsung tahun depan.Selain itu, ada kode "'aa dd" yang menyiratkan tanggal pasti pelaksanaan Hammersonic keempat belum ditetapkan secara resmi.Pada 2018, festival Hammersonic menampilkan 38 band yang terdiri dari lokal dan Internasional, seperti Escape The Fate (Amerika Serikat), IHSAHN (Norwegia) dan In Flames (Swedia).Sementara band metal lokal yang tampil adalah Dead Squad, Noxa, Koil dan Hellcrust. Selain itu juga terdapat band punk internasional dan lokal, seperti Dead Kennedys (Amerika Serikat) dan Marjinal (Indonesia). (chri/end)
text:
Slipknot Confirmation Comes to Hammersonic 2020
Nov 6 2019, 19:26 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Metal band Slipknot confirmed its presence at the Hammersonic music festival held in 2020. (Wikimedia Commons / Iowa Chimot Maggot)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Slipknot heavy metal band confirmed its presence in the Hammersonic music festival held in 2020. Through uploads on social media, the Surfacing singer announced their arrival to Southeast Asia in 2020. "We will come to Asia for Knot Fest. Japan, Hammersonic and many more in March 2020, "Slipknot said in his upload, Wednesday (6/11).



Slipknot's arrival was also confirmed by Hammersonic. The music festival will return after the last time it was held on July 22, 2018 in Ancol, North Jakarta. "The day has finally arrived. We are pleased to announce that Slipknot has officially become one of the main fillers of Hammersonic 2020," Hammersonic said in its upload. for the next surprise, "the statement continued.



In addition to Hammersonic, reported by The Straits Times, Slipknot is also scheduled to perform at the Singapore Rock Festival II on March 24, 2020. The Hammersonic music festival in September announced it will again hit metal music fans through the latest event. It was announced by the organizer through a short video on their Instagram account, Friday (6/9). The video features the Hammersonic text and the slogan "The Rise of Empire". "Monster is Back !! Be prepared Hammerhead!" said the statement in the video. In the video there is also the writing of the Roman numerals "MMXX" which means "2020" and implies the holding of the four festivals will take place next year. In addition, there is a "aa dd" code which implies the exact date of the fourth Hammersonic event has not been officially established. 2018, the Hammersonic festival featured 38 bands consisting of local and international, such as Escape The Fate (United States), IHSAHN (Norway) and In Flames (Sweden). While the local metal bands that performed were Dead Squad, Noxa, Koil and Hellcrust. There are also international and local punk bands, such as Dead Kennedys (United States) and Marginal (Indonesia). (chri / end)
